item.title: No album cover art in Symbian ^3 Belle on an E7
item.description: Sooo, my beloved n900 kicked the bucket and the fine folks at Nokia Romania decided it’s not fixable and they replaced it. With an E7. After 6 weeks. Hey Nokia still wondering why you’re going down the drain? I have my music neatly organized and with cover art embeded inside the id3tag. But it won’t show up. Actually it showed up for one album out of 15. So I started the hunt to see why.
